segments.speaker: Speaker 1
segments.text: hello everyone thank you guys for coming to our weekly student success meeting and let's just get started here i have our list of chronically absent students here and i've been noticing a troubling trend a lot of students are skipping on fridays does anyone have any idea what's going on

segments.speaker: Speaker 3
segments.text: i've heard some of my mentis talking about how it's really hard to get out of bed on fridays it might be good if we did something like a pancake breakfast to encourage them to come

segments.speaker: Speaker 1
segments.text: i think that is a great idea

segments.speaker: Speaker 1
segments.text: i want to try that next week

segments.speaker: Speaker 4
segments.text: it might also be because a lot of students have been getting sick now that it's getting colder outside i've had a number of students come by my office with symptoms like sniffling and coughing we should put up posters with tips for not getting sick since it's almost flucies and wash our hands after the bathroom stuff like that

segments.speaker: Speaker 1
segments.text: i think that's a good idea and it'll be a good reminder for the teachers as well to one other things i want to talk about there's a student i've noticed here john smith he's missed seven days already and it's only november does anyone have an idea what's going on with him

segments.speaker: Speaker 3
segments.text: i might be able to fail on the gaps there i talked to john today and he's really stressed out he's been dealing with helping his parents take care of his younger siblings during the day it might actually be a good idea if he spoke to the guidance councillor a little bit

segments.speaker: Speaker 2
segments.text: i can talk to john today if you want to send him to my office after you meet with him it's a lot to deal with for a middle schooler

segments.speaker: Speaker 5
segments.text: and i can help out with the family's childcare needs i will look for some free or low cost

segments.speaker: Speaker 5
segments.text: resources in the community to share with john and he can share them with his family

segments.speaker: Speaker 1
segments.text: it is a really good ideas here today thanks for coming and if no one has anything else i think we can rap up
